bilingual.source: He called his ex-girlfriend a harpy after their bitter breakup.
bilingual.target: 在痛苦的分手后，他称他的前女友为恶毒的女人。

bilingual.source: The olive is a small, bitter drupe often used in cooking.
bilingual.target: 橄榄是一种小而苦的核果，常用于烹饪。
有的人很喜欢吃苦的东西。
我们心中不再有爱，我们变成了非常痛苦的人。
为什么白金雀儿碱的派生物是苦的?

list.abstract: Bitter（英 [ˈbɪtə]，美 [ˈbɪtər]），英语单词，作形容词用，为辛辣的；苦的；愤怒的。作名词用，为苦啤；苦精；比特酒。作动词用，为使变苦。短语搭配有a bitter pill（不得不承受的苦事），例句为“She wept bitter tears of self-reproach.（她因自责而流下痛苦的眼泪。）” Bitter形容词类近义词有painful、hurt，名词类近义词有gall，副词类近义词有strongly、hotly。Bitter的副词形式为bitterly、bitingly，名词形式为bitterness、bitters，最高级为bitterest。

yingyinNormal.en: Not to me. I have a very bitter taste in my mouth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对我来说不是，我嘴里有股苦味。

yingyinNormal.en: She broke up with you? I hadn't heard that. See? All bitter... better.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她跟你提分手的吗？我没听过这事呢。看，太有事，没事了。

yingyinNormal.en: Go on phase two. Years of mandated hiding and silence have made us bitter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 进入第二阶段。多年来的躲藏和静默让我们萌生出不满。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't claim that. President Walker does. Oh, yes. A man made bitter by his own mistakes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 指控你的不是我，是沃克总统。是啊，那个自尝苦果心怀怨愤的男人。

yingyinNormal.en: Turns out recently, Andrew married Simon. My bitter rival from law school. Or nemesis? I've...
yingyinNormal.zh: 没想到，安德鲁最近跟西蒙结婚了。我在法学院的死敌，或者说…冤家？我已经…

yingyinNormal.en: Then one night, an unexpected intruder arrived at the castle, seeking shelter from the bitter storm.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个风雨交加的夜晚，一位不速之客进入了城堡，想要避雨。

yingyinNormal.en: So what do we toast tonight, Minister Antonius? We toast to the glorious era coming to it's bitter end.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么我们今晚到底庆祝什么，安东尼厄斯？我们要庆祝这峥嵘岁月终将以凄苦收尾。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, don't bag on Sandra Bullock! You think it makes you look cultured, but you just come off as bitter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 喂，不许你说桑德拉·布洛克坏话！你以为这样显得很有内涵，但你表现出来的只是刻薄而已。

yingyinNormal.en: Which sister is this? Is this the spoiled one or the one bitter? Daddy cut me off. Never mind, I got it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是哪个妹妹？被宠坏的还是曾咬过她的？老爸断了我的财源。我知道了。

yingyinNormal.en: And this offer will enrage him, but I've shown his council, army and people that I'm a diplomat until the bitter end.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么这个提议就会激怒他，但我已经向他的朝廷，军队和人民展现出我的外交家风度。

yingyinNormal.en: Add 10 grams each of salt and yeast to the mix and then some treacle, which adds a caramel bitter-sweetness and color.
yingyinNormal.zh: 再各加10克的食盐和酵母粉和匀加一些糖蜜，吃起来会更甜，颜色也会更好看。

yingyinNormal.en: Why not? Well, let's see, first of all, the prospect of ending up bitter and lonely drunk doesn't quite appeal to me. OK.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么不是？嗯，你看，首先，我可不想孤独老死，一人沉醉。好吧。

yingyinNormal.en: I am loving this country theme. This reminds me of when I worked for Newscenter Twelve in Tulsa, except no one here's bitter and drunk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我超爱这个乡村主题！让我想起当初给塔尔萨市的十二新闻台工作的日子，除了这里没有刻薄的醉汉。

yingyinNormal.en: But the bitter truth we critics must face is that in the grand scheme of things, the average piece of junk is probably more meaningful than our criticism designating it so.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我们评论家得面对难堪的事实，就是以价值而言，我们的评论，可能根本比不上我们大肆批评的平庸事物。

yingyinNormal.en: And you can use any other cooking wine, but I love Shao Hsing, from the Shao Hsing region in China. Just gives this gorgeous, bitter-sweet edge to any dish, and it just takes the rawness of meat or fish, and any odours off meat and fish.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你也可以使用其他料酒，但我爱用绍兴，中国绍兴地区产的绍兴米酒，可以让菜肴变得鲜美，苦中带甜，而且可以令肉或鱼更加入味，还能去除肉的腥味。

yingyinNormal.en: I know things have been weird lately, but you're like my oldest friend in the world, except for Laurie Schaffer, who I don't talk to anymore, 'cause she's all bitter now that she lost the weight and it turns out, she doesn't have a pretty face.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我感觉最近有点奇怪，你是我认识最久的朋友，除了萝瑞之外，我现在已经再和她说话，因为她虽已减肥成功，但是脸蛋依然丑陋。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 激烈的; 充满敌意的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: (of wind, cold, or weather) intensely cold
having a sharp, pungent taste or smell
painful or unpleasant to accept or contemplate
feeling angry and unhappy because you feel that you have been treated unfairly
very serious and unpleasant, with a lot of anger and hatred involved

exam_freq_info.chinese: 痛苦的; 令人悲痛的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: If too much is removed, the leaves will break into pieces; if not enough is removed, the tea will taste <highlight>bitter</highlight>(苦的).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果去除得太多，叶子就会碎成碎片；如果去除得不够，茶的味道会变苦。

examination_example.sentence: Machine-made tea floats longer in water and tastes <highlight>bitter</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 机制茶在水中漂浮的时间更长，味道更苦。

examination_example.sentence: The student asked his teacher, “Master, the water was bad and it was <highlight>bitter</highlight>?"
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生问他的老师:“老师，这水不好，而且苦吗?”
